# fui-typography

The `fui-typography` component is used to display text with different styles.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute   | Description | Type                                                          | Default  |
| ----------- | ----------- | ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- |
| `code`      | `code`      |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `deleted`   | `deleted`   |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `disabled`  | `disabled`  |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `italic`    | `italic`    |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `keyboard`  | `keyboard`  |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `mark`      | `mark`      |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `strong`    | `strong`    |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
| `type`      | `type`      |             | `"danger" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "text" \| "warning"` | `'text'` |
| `underline` | `underline` |             | `boolean`                                                     | `false`  |
